channel.title: Fish on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Fish on ZooBerry

item.title: Lemon Shark
item.description: The Lemon Shark features two variations, with the darker variation as the default skin. Requires MM2 to use.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Ribbon Eel
item.description: Ribbon eels are aptly named for their delicate movements, as they swim like a slender ribbon dancing in the water column.

item.title: Piranha
item.description: These piranhas will form interesting schools in your jungle tanks.

item.title: Bream
item.description: A freshwater fish from various types of waterways in Europe.

item.title: Koi Carp
item.description: A domesticated cyprinid known for their wide range of color morphs.
